title: Garden City, Kansas
description: Center pivot irrigation systems create red circles of healthy vegetation in this image of croplands near Garden City, Kansas. This is a false-color composite image made using near infrared, red, and green wavelengths. The image has also been sharpened using the sensor’s panchromatic band.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
